\usepackage{lettrine}

\def\texGetFirstLetter#1#2/{#1}
\newcommand{\getFirstLetter}[1]{\texGetFirstLetter#1/}

\def\texGetOtherLetters#1#2/{#2}
\newcommand{\getOtherLetters}[1]{\texGetOtherLetters#1/}

\newcommand{\Lettrine}[1]
{\lettrine[lraise=0.11]{\textcolor[gray]{0.5}{\getFirstLetter{#1}}}{\getOtherLetters{#1}}}
